Reviews.Title: not bad for being outdated
Reviews.Author: young3n
Reviews.Content: I got this phone 2 weeks ago. I broke my htc thunderbolt and didn't want to upgrade since verizon new plans suck. Phone seems quick because of the smaller screen. Auto resize takes away any webpage size problems.  I put the extended battery in from the get go so i have no problem making it 12 hrs. Keyboard felt small till your fingers get used to it. Make sure you have a larger sd card because ir only comes with 2 gigs. Overall satisfied with phone at a cheap price with no new terrible contract _

Reviews.Title: I Love My Droid Pro!!!
Reviews.Author: JessMikey
Reviews.Content: Been about a year... And my Motorola Droid Pro, has outlived a iPhone 3gs, and other petty things... Out of all honesty, the camera on the Pro was better than my iPhone's!!! Love it to death! Thought about selling it since I am no longer with Verizon, but I still use it with Wifi... This phone with it's 5MP camera, and sturdy QWERTY keyboard, has won my heart!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: R. Stauffer "Rebecca"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone after my own Droid Pro had started to deteriorate for whatever reason. I got it used and was warned about a small missing piece of plastic in the corner of the keyboard. That was literally the only defect on the phone and that wasn't the kind of problem that causes any problems in using the phone. It worked great. As far as Droid Pros themselves, I liked mine for the most part while I had it. But I went through three of them, and each of them had charging port issues. My friend has also had two Droid Pros that the charging port became loose in and stopped working. I have an iPhone now, but as far as Droids go, I really liked this one.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement for my Blackberry
Reviews.Author: tsr_thanatos
Reviews.Content: While I'm still getting used to the Android phone, it does SO much more than my Blackberry can, and MUCH faster too.  If you like the Blackberry style of keyboard, this is very similiar.  It takes a bit to get used to, but I wouldn't go back to BB after using the Android.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Pablo Rivera "Pablo Rivera"
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly fine, came in perfect condition. I enjoy using this product a lot, it is easy to use. I really recommend it!

Reviews.Title: arrived quickly
Reviews.Author: liza
Reviews.Content: this arrived quickly and its a great buy the kids are happy with it so they can serve the web on free wi fi

Reviews.Title: Never again
Reviews.Author: Konstantine
Reviews.Content: I will never buy a used phone again, one thing that was ba about it it had screen luck on it i had to go on YouTube and fined out how to reset it to manufacturing settings, the other thing the most important it didn't charge.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Shaquana griffith
Reviews.Content: No complaint at all, the phone connects to the internet and doesn't freeze on me. I am Living in Italy and has different service out here, but my sim card works perfectly with this phone. thanks amazon!!!!

Reviews.Title: Like this Phone
Reviews.Author: PJohnson
Reviews.Content: I wanted this type of phone and so far I really like it.I still have to learn everything that this phone can do but I'm happy with it!

Reviews.Title: opinion
Reviews.Author: Carlos Dario Flores
Reviews.Content: assessed with 5 This cell to meet with all necedsiades basically seeking style I love the phone the only thing I dislike is that I can not dial numbers such as # 123 # * 611 among others but do not give importance because that happened to me here in my country by bad unlock.ending and would recommend this product for those who like somebody need only the basic functions of the cell and do not expect much of the same in comparison with other

Reviews.Title: best phone ever
Reviews.Author: Elaine Barclay "DEB"
Reviews.Content: Best phone I ever had. bought mine then bought one for boyfriend and one for mom. they are so fast, so much storage and so many apps. 3,000 pictures and still fast. the best of a touch screen but with an easy to type keyboard. great camera. highly recommend

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: michael p downing
Reviews.Content: good size. fingers too big for query key pad so i downloaded swype. not 4 g or the fastes haven't had no problem with none of the apps i run on it. had minor scratches on back of it was to be expected for 45 dollars but phone works great

Reviews.Title: M PRO
Reviews.Author: Brandon W
Reviews.Content: Well I chose this phone because VZW wanted me to upgrade to a more expensive and yet limiting plan. Simply wouldnt happen so I bought this again to replace a cracked screen. Mic is awful on these so I often have to use speaker but the old one was like that too. Not awesome but it works just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: i love this phone, it's like a Blackberry and an Android rolled into one device. I'm gutted that i can't unlock it to a different GSM carrier. If you're going to get this phone to use on straight talk, T-mobile etc., heed my words - buy it unlocked, i've tried four different companies who supply unlock codes remotely and none of them work so i'm stuck with Verizon.

Reviews.Title: drroid phone
Reviews.Author: brenda burkett
Reviews.Content: the phone is good , it was smaller than I thought and could not play games that the Samsung phone

Reviews.Title: es perfecto
Reviews.Author: Juan Antonio Guerrero
Reviews.Content: lo copre usado y llego en buen estado lo recomiendo buen telefono esta de lo mejor buena pantalla buana rapides buen estado buen uso lo quiero

Reviews.Title: never agian
Reviews.Author: Diana Grundy
Reviews.Content: i never reccived and refuseal of money back not appricated will never order form them agian. . . . .

Reviews.Title: Seller gave me damaged goods.
Reviews.Author: Roger John Robertson Jr.
Reviews.Content: I have no problem with the Droid Pro as a phone. I quite enjoyed it, and this was my second device. However, 3 weeks after I bought my replacement from this seller, it inexplicably died. I took it to a Verizon dealer, and they were unable to determine what happened, although they suspected some water damage. I suppose I'll take it as a lesson to never buy uncertified used devices.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice phone
Reviews.Author: J. W. Tetlow
Reviews.Content: Strongly reminiscent of thee Palm Pixi or Palm Pixi plus. Since it's an android phone ¬ a WEBOS, It is inherently less user friendly. On the whole, a nice phone with aa great camera. I just wish the Wife wasn't so complicated. I am forced to look for the portal login page &total; it's never in the same place and makes logging onto some networks unnecessarily diifficult
